item.title: The Hidden Number Problem
item.description: Notes on the Boneh and Venkatesan's paper describing the Hidden Number Problem and code demonstrating some of the results.

item.title: Measures of Entropy
item.description: Different ways to describe the entropy of a random variable.

item.title: RSA-based Key Encapsulation Mechanisms
item.description: How to use RSA to encrypt symmetric keys and how RSA-KEM relates to RSA-OAEP.

item.title: Questions for System Design Reviews
item.description: Moving towards operationalizing system design reviews. What questions should a review team ask, or expect to be answered?

item.title: What is the Value-add of ssh-agent?
item.description: The purpose of ssh-agent and observations how ssh-agent improves UX and security.

item.title: Fiat-Shamir Heuristic
item.description: Overview and implementation of the Fiat-Shamir heuristic used to build signature schemes from interactive zero-knowledge proofs.

item.title: Building Lattice Reduction (LLL) Intuition
item.description: My attempt to grok the Lenstra–Lenstra–Lovász (LLL) algorithm used for basis reduction.

item.title: Subgroup Confinement Attacks
item.description: Subgroup confinement attacks can apply in offline and online contexts.

item.title: User-influenced Shell Commands Are Still Considered Harmful
item.description: Non-obvious ways of getting code execution when testing code that uses user input to build shell commands.

item.title: The GGH Cryptosystem
item.description: An introduction to lattice-based cryptography using the broken Goldreich–Goldwasser–Halevi (GGH) cryptosystem.

item.title: ASIS CTF 2016: RSA Write-up
item.description: Breaking RSA with sequential prime key parameter generation.

item.title: Tokyo Westerns / MMA CTF: Twin Primes Write-up
item.description: Decrypting RSA ciphertexts using correlated parameters.

item.title: Modifying IP Headers With netfilter
item.description: Using netfilter to programmtically rewrite the source IP address of ICMP packets.

item.title: Iceland
item.description: Takeaways from my first trip to Iceland and places I hope to revisit.

item.title: Secure Password Hash Migrations
item.description: How to securely migrate from an insecure password hash algorithm to a secure one.

item.title: Fuzzing Servers
item.description: One tip for finding fast and useful fuzz targets for networked code.

item.title: About kel.bz
item.description: My name is Kelby Ludwig. I like math, cryptography, and software security. My resume can be found here.
